caseTitle: The State thr. Regional Director/Force Commander, A.N.F., Balochistan v. Imam Bakhsh
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Rule 5 of the Control of Narcotic Substances (Government Analysts) Rules, 2001 is directory while Rule 6 is mandatory to the extent that the full protocols ought to be mentioned in the report of the Government Analyst. Non-compliance of Rule 6 will render the report of the Government Analyst inconclusive and unreliable.
